name: jollity
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
the quality of being jolly (= happy and smiling), or behaviour that shows this: There was music, dancing, and a great deal of jollity.forced jollity The evening had a slight feeling of forced jollity about it. jollities [ plural ] UK old-fashioned
celebrations at which people enjoy themselves: In the lull between Christmas jollities and New Year celebrations, there's time to look back at the past year.
